plot: A stunningly photographed celebration of the beauty and joy of surfing. Many of the world's best surfers of the 1970's including Jeff Hakman and Barry Kanaiaupuni take on the best waves of California, France, Peru, and Hawaii.
title: Sea for Yourself
plot_es: A stunningly photographed celebration of the beauty and joy of surfing. Many of the world's best surfers of the 1970's including Jeff Hakman and Barry Kanaiaupuni take on the best waves of California, France, Peru, and Hawaii.
plot_en: A stunningly photographed celebration of the beauty and joy of surfing. Many of the world's best surfers of the 1970's including Jeff Hakman and Barry Kanaiaupuni take on the best waves of California, France, Peru, and Hawaii.
